dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

dependencies.description:
NVPL BLAS (NVIDIA Performance Libraries BLAS) is part of NVIDIA
Performance Libraries that provides standard Fortran 77 BLAS APIs as
well as C (CBLAS).
dependencies.name: nvpl-blas

dependencies.description:
NVPL LAPACK (NVIDIA Performance Libraries LAPACK) is part of NVIDIA
Performance Libraries that provides standard Fortran 90 LAPACK APIs.
dependencies.name: nvpl-lapack

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
